name: Man's Best Friend (FooFuhh)
description:
-----------------------------------------------------------------

A stray dog finds a home for himself by going out of its comfort zone, but the world is reality, it's not only a bunch of environmental danger, many people are not kind to the stray animals, and it's also hard to get full stomachs. They attack stray animals or call a dog catcher to execute them with death.

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Designer

  • Foo Yong Liang
  • Vanessa Cho

Programmer

  • Lim Junhan
  • Liew Jie Nan
